keyMoments.title: Kashii's Debut as Enies Lobby Gatekeeper
keyMoments.description: Kashii appears for the first time as one of two giant guardians protecting Enies Lobby's main gate. His imposing presence and massive size shock the invading forces.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the major obstacles the Straw Hat allies must overcome to rescue Robin. His debut establishes the World Government's formidable defenses.

keyMoments.title: Kashii's 50-Year Service Revealed
keyMoments.description: Kashii reveals that he has been serving as a gatekeeper for 50 years, believing he is working toward the release of his former captains Dorry and Brogy from imprisonment.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the tragic backstory of Kashii's service and the World Government's deception. This information sets up his eventual defection when he learns the truth.

keyMoments.title: Kashii Defeats the Kairiki Destroyers
keyMoments.description: Kashii easily defeats the three largest members of the Franky Family, demonstrating the enormous power gap between giants and even the largest humans.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Kashii as a formidable opponent and shows that brute strength alone won't be enough to overcome him.

keyMoments.title: Kashii Brought Down by Allied Forces
keyMoments.description: Despite his immense strength, Kashii is successfully tackled and brought down through the combined efforts of Sodom, Gomorrah, Paulie, Zambai, Mozu, and Kiwi.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that teamwork and strategy can overcome even the most powerful individual opponents. This victory gives hope to the rescue mission.

reveals.information: Has served as Enies Lobby's gatekeeper for 50 years after being deceived by the World Government
Former member of the Giant Warrior Pirates who sailed under captains Dorry and Brogy
Serves the World Government believing it will lead to the release of Dorry and Brogy from Impel Down

relationships.description: Fellow giant gatekeeper and companion who shares the same deception and goal of freeing their captains.

evolutionMoments.description: Both giants work together as gatekeepers and reveal their shared history and motivation.

relationships.description: Former captain of the Giant Warrior Pirates whom Kashii deeply respects and is trying to free.
Former captain of the Giant Warrior Pirates whom Kashii deeply respects and is trying to free.

keyMoments.title: Oimo's Debut as Enies Lobby Gatekeeper
keyMoments.description: Oimo appears alongside Kashii as the second giant guardian of Enies Lobby's main gate. His massive presence and intimidating demeanor shock the allied forces.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the second major obstacle at the main gate, doubling the challenge facing the rescue party.

keyMoments.title: Oimo's 50-Year Service Revealed
keyMoments.description: Oimo explains that he has been serving as a gatekeeper for 50 years under the false belief that he is working toward freeing his captains Dorry and Brogy.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the World Government's manipulation and the tragic circumstances that have kept Oimo in service for half a century.

keyMoments.title: Oimo Defeats the Kairiki Destroyers
keyMoments.description: Oimo works with Kashii to easily overpower the Kairiki Destroyers, showing the giants' overwhelming strength advantage.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that the giants are not just physically imposing but also highly effective in combat.

reveals.information: Has served as Enies Lobby's gatekeeper for 50 years after being deceived by the World Government
Former member of the Giant Warrior Pirates who sailed under captains Dorry and Brogy
Serves the World Government believing it will lead to the release of Dorry and Brogy from Impel Down

relationships.description: Fellow giant gatekeeper and close companion who shares the same deception and goal.

evolutionMoments.description: Both giants work together as gatekeepers and reveal their shared history and motivation.

relationships.description: Former captain of the Giant Warrior Pirates whom Oimo deeply respects and is trying to free.
Former captain of the Giant Warrior Pirates whom Oimo deeply respects and is trying to free.

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Solo Assault on Enies Lobby
keyMoments.description: Luffy charges into Enies Lobby alone, overwhelming thousands of Marines with his determination to rescue Robin.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's unwavering commitment to his crew and sets the tone for the entire rescue mission.

keyMoments.title: Marine Puppet Technique
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses a creative technique where he wraps his stretchy limbs around a Marine and uses him as a puppet to fight other Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's growing tactical creativity in combat, possibly influenced by Usopp's clever fighting style.

abilities.description: Luffy wraps his stretchy arms and legs around an enemy Marine and controls them like a puppet to attack other enemies.

keyMoments.title: Rope Action: Figure of Eight Knot
keyMoments.description: Paulie uses his signature rope technique to bind and defeat multiple Marines at Enies Lobby's main gate.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates how Paulie's shipwright skills translate effectively into combat.

keyMoments.title: Assists in Defeating Kashii
keyMoments.description: Paulie works with Zambai, Mozu, and Kiwi to help Sodom and Gomorrah take down the giant Kashii.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Paulie working seamlessly with former rivals (Franky Family) for a common cause.

abilities.abilityName: Rope Action: Figure of Eight Knot
abilities.description: Paulie uses ropes tied in a figure-eight knot pattern to bind and restrain multiple opponents simultaneously.
